New Records: Aaron Judge ended the longest home run drought of his career with a go-ahead grand slam in the seventh inning
Key Match Events: Judge homered to left (369 feet), Verdugo scored, Torres scored and Soto scored.
Yoshida homered to right center (408 feet), Duran scored.
Story homered to right center (373 feet), Casas scored.
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Yankee Stadium with an attendance of 45,292
The Red Sox won the previous 3 games in the series before the Yankees' comeback win
